long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Triple Whale Pixel Helper is a tool that helps you validate your pixel implementation. 

It works in the background to look for the TW Pixel, and provide real-time feedback on the implementation. When clicked, a panel will expand to show a detailed overview of the page's pixel and the stream of captured events, including warnings, errors and successes.
